About Us

We're three college students who like wine and want to help make Wine Tours as easy as possible to organize.

This application was made for CS 4302 with Prof. Bernhard Haslhofer and Prof. Theresa Velden. This project displays the concepts we learned in class, including:

  • RESTful Webservice API
  • 303 Content-Negotiation
  • Linked Data
  • RDF Implementation
  • Structured Formats such as XML, JSON, Turtle and YAML
